ExcludeByDDNS.PluginDescription: This plugin lets you dynamically exclude an IP using a DDNS update
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSSettingsDescription: Settings to exclude your dynamic IP address.
ExcludeByDDNS.CurrentExcludedIp: Your currently excluded IP is: %1$s (last update: %2$s)
ExcludeByDDNS.NoIpExcluded: You have not excluded any IP yet.
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSUpdateExclusion: Use a DDNS update to refresh the excluded IP
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSUpdateExclusionDesc: Use the following URL to exclude your dynamic IP address using a DDNS update:
ExcludeByDDNS.DDNSUpdateExclusionDesc2: Supplying hostname, username or password is not needed. Leave them empty or type in anything if a value is required.
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameExclusion: Exclude the IP of an auto-updated hostname
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameExclusionDesc: If already using a DDNS update to update a specific hostname, you can use this hostname to exclude its IP.
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameExclusionDesc2: The update will resolve the IP of the hostname every hour
ExcludeByDDNS.NoExclusionsSet: No IP exclusions are set up.
ExcludeByDDNS.HostnameError: Unable to resolve the IP of the given hostname
